ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Happy to see
you again!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
I have the exact same thing, so I wanted to give
you this!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Take it,
if you’d like!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
I’ll bring you something again, so look forward to
it, OK?
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2103_01_10: Thanks for always helping me out! This is for you.
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2103_02_10: I thought a lot about what you’d want.
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2201_01_10: OK, let’s have a chat, shall we?
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I’m looking forward to talking with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Getting a present from someone makes me
really happy!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was fun! Let’s talk again sometime!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
I feel like I’ve learned another thing about you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8201_2401_02_10: I’d love to talk again sometime!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
This place is very comfortable. That’s probably
why many people gather here.
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I came here because something smelled delicious,
but that’s our little secret, OK?
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Sync pairs come here, tempted by the smell
of curry...
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Curry opens up the world! I doubt there are many
who don’t like curry!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8002_0701_03_10: I hope I can grow closer to everyone on Pasio!
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Did you know that Pokémon also have secrets
they’ll share when you go camping with them?
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
You see a side of them they don’t show during
Pokémon battles.
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Especially when they’re someone else’s Pokémon—
you don’t usually get to see that.
ch0243_00_yuri_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
I’d love to see your Pokémon’s different sides,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
